subclassFeature.name: Primaris Lieutenant Martial Archetype
entries: Primaris Lieutenants are the best, I can't wait for them to release more! They're honestly the best thing the Adeptus Astartes have at their disposal and make you wonder why you need captains or chapter masters at all!

subclassFeature.name: Combat Tactics
entries: Starting at 3rd level you can use your bonus action to use one of the Combat Tactics detailed below. You can do this twice and regain expended uses after you finish a short or long rest.

items.name: With me, as one!
entries: You may, after hitting a target with an attack, use your bonus action to choose up to 3 friendly creatures you can see to gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against a target that's already been hit by your attack.

items.name: Focus Fire!
entries: You gain +2 bonus to attack rolls against a target that's already been hit by an ally this round.

items.name: Rally to me brothers!
entries: Choose up to 3 friendly creatures you can see, they all gain temporary hit points equal to 1d10 + your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).

items.name: Hold the line!
entries: Choose up to 3 friendly creatures you can see which may include yourself; if a hostile creature comes within 5 feet of one of these creatures, said creature may use their reaction to make a single melee attack against the creature before the end of your next turn.
You gain two additional uses of this feature at 10th level and another two uses at 18th level.

subclassFeature.name: Weapon Drills
entries: At 7th level you've trained extensively with a very particular set of weapons. You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with longswords, light crossbows, heavy crossbows and hand crossbows.
This bonus increases to +2 at 15th level.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Combat Tactics
entries: At 10th level you gain two additional uses of your Combat Tactics feature.

subclassFeature.name: Know No Fear
entries: At 10th level you can extend the benefit of your Indomitable feature to an ally. When you decide to use Indomitable to reroll an Intelligence, a Wisdom, or a Charisma saving throw and you aren't incapacitated, you can choose one ally within 60 feet of you that also failed its saving throw against the same effect. If that creature can see or hear you, it can reroll its saving throw and must use the new roll.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Weapon Drills
entries: Starting at 15th level your bonus from Weapon Drills increases to +2.

subclassFeature.name: Gene-forged Might
entries: Starting at 15th level once per turn when you score a critical hit you can make one additional attack with the same weapon.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Combat Tactics
entries: At 18th level you gain two additional uses of your Combat Tactics feature.

subclassFeature.name: Tactical Precision
entries: At 18th level your battle prowess allows you and your close allies to strike true against the enemy. You and allied creatures within 10ft. of you can roll the damage dice for their weapon attacks twice and choose the higher result.
